name: Taco Turkey Wraps
author: Bibi
summary: Sour cream, taco seasoning, and shredded Mexican cheese bring south-of-the-border flair to deli turkey in the rapid wraps. The yield will be determined by the number of tortillas you use and the thickness of the slices.
ingredients: ½ cup pico de gallo salsa, drained
½ pound thinly sliced deli turkey breast
directions: Mix sour cream, pico de gallo, and   in a bowl; spread onto each flour tortilla
Sprinkle Mexican cheese blend over sour cream mixture layer
Roll each tortilla around the filling
Wrap each with aluminum foil and refrigerate 8 hours to overnight
Remove aluminum foil and slice each wrap cross-wise into 3/8-inch slices
